thread.title: Life | Dog lies down for hours on road where owner died
thread.title_full: Life | Dog lies down for hours on road where owner died - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: Life | Dog lies down for hours on road where owner died
text:
A woman in Jacksonville, Florida was hit by a reversing truck when she was out walking her dog yesterday morning.
Kelly Black and her dog, Paco, were walking down Chaffee Road when a semi-truck hit Kelly and dragged her to the middle of the road. Paco, her dog, stayed with her and remained there long after ambulances came.
Unfortunately, Kelly Black was pronounce dead on the scene, however Paco was unharmed and refused to leave the spot where her owner perished.
Paramedics and accident investigators said that the dog lay down on the spot where his owner died and remained there for several hours until someone came to take the dog away.
'Rocko's' tail wags as he's reunited with family. @ActionNewsJax pic.twitter.com/Ajf3yNP0kH
â€” Russell Colburn (@RussellANjax) October 23, 2015 The local police station reported that Paco eventually left with Kelly's father and family when they arrived on the scene. As Kelly's father, G.C. Bostick reported, the pair were inseparable and often walked together.
Via ActionNewsJax
